amendment.description: To provide that any cooperative organization or other entity that receives a business and industry direct or guaranteed loan for a wind energy project is ineligible for any other Federal benefit, assistance, or incentive for the project.

action.text: Amendment SA 2191 proposed by Senator Alexander.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2191 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 66. Record Vote Number: 132.
